visual_tags: Hair: Styled, undercut dark brown hair
Eyes: Warm amber eyes, slightly glowing
Outfit: Vintage red and white varsity jacket (high contrast to Kai's dark tones)
Visual Effect: A subtle static/glitch effect around his outline

description.physical: Handsome, athletic, slightly translucent. He looks exactly as he did the day he died.
description.personality: Charismatic, protective, carefree (a stark contrast to Kai).

gemini.prompt:
Create a CHARACTER TURNAROUND SHEET in webtoon art style.

## LAYOUT
Create a SINGLE IMAGE showing the SAME character THREE times side by side:
- LEFT: Full body FRONT view (facing viewer)
- CENTER: Full body SIDE view (profile, facing right)
- RIGHT: Full body BACK view (facing away)

## REQUIREMENTS
- All three views show the EXACT SAME character with IDENTICAL outfit
- Full body from head to feet in each view
- Relaxed standing pose (arms slightly away from body to show costume)
- Clean white or light gray background
- Character sheet/model sheet style for animation reference
- All views at the same scale and aligned at feet level
- Show clothing, hair, and accessories clearly from all angles
- Professional quality suitable for production reference

## CONSISTENCY IS CRITICAL
- Same hair style/color in all views
- Same outfit in all views (every detail must match)
- Same accessories and items in all views
- Same body proportions in all views


Character: Ren
Age: 24 (at time of death)
Physical appearance: Handsome, athletic, slightly translucent. He looks exactly as he did the day he died.
Visual details: Hair: Styled, undercut dark brown hair, Eyes: Warm amber eyes, slightly glowing, Outfit: Vintage red and white varsity jacket (high contrast to Kai's dark tones), Top: Pristine white t-shirt underneath, Bottom: Clean blue jeans, Visual Effect: A subtle static/glitch effect around his outline
Personality (for expression): Charismatic, protective, carefree (a stark contrast to Kai).
